review_text: Some good tips on how to write well for my brand, and it helped me understand the importance of data and SEO content with useful guidance on ways to research. Good to hear from a trained write as well, I'll be looking out for your next articles in the Times.

Really helpful course about optimizing website content and Seo.
Clear and useful information without any unnecessary talk.
Very good,
Thank you!

This course was really informative! Thank you for providing such value at a little cost. I kept hitting the pause button particularly at the quiz session to take down some of those questions. Thank you.

The manner in which you explained SEO copywriting was very easy to follow. No technical jargon or fluffy content. I will be implementing these in my freelancing and communications with my customers.
Very informative & easy to understand. Highly recommended!

I found the course content very good
I found having to repeat quizzes constantly VERY ANNOYING
Particularly when the repeat questions were DIFFERENT from the original 
PLUS, I had to waste my time repeating quizzes before I could move on.

ALSO, in most cases, I believe that my answers were at least as correct.
.
You did ask!
Great advice in a brief structure - Thank you.
A good introduction to the subject. Very nice and concise. Thank you.

Good material, organized and concise. Easy to understand. The course refers to exercises that are not available. The materials download at the beginning is related to making Facebook Groups, which doesn't seem to have any relation to the course.

This course was very helpful to me and extremely interesting! 
Thank you Sarah, I wish to take more of your courses.

Excellent courseâ€”this presents a thorough overview of SEO and how it can be effectively applied. I knew bits and pieces of this going in but lacked the perspective this offers. I recommend this for those in a similar position, or just getting started with the concept.
Incredibly useful. Breaks down info in easy-to-digest sections, getting right to the point and making it very easy to understand. Highly recommend
Excellent course. I enjoyed and learned so much from it. It was very informative and engaging. I highly recommend it!!

Clear, concise and considered!  A really helpful course that has given me plenty of new ideas and a plan of action for my website.  It explained much of the jargon around SEO, making it feel more accessible and something I can tackle.  I would certainly recommend this course to anyone unsure about how SEO and good copywriting can help them and their website.

Here's why I gave this course only 3 stars:



1) I bought a few courses and this is the only one I found typos in.

2) Indicate the wrong video length in the title.

3) Unlike other courses, you don't get an explanation after you finish the quiz.

4) There aren't a lot of hands-on skills taught, just a lot of general information.

5) Doesn't justify its price tag.

6) There's no transcript in the videos, unlike other courses.
